column4: are you still there? Because apparently the alt cd also has some issues with this laptop.
what hardware are you running and have you checked it out in the supported hardware list
i have not. Let me check that.

the laptop i'm trying to install it on is not in that list (Asus A7U) however the surrounding laptops appear to be supported. The alt installer has trouble detecting the HD, yet the BIOS has no options to change anything.
